languages.text: "Да! Вся моя семья, все... теперь будем осматриваться тут, искать, куда себя пристроить".

traits.locale_text: "Да! Вся моя семья, все... теперь будем осматриваться тут, искать, куда себя пристроить".

languages.text: "That's right! My whole family's here. I guess we'll... have a look around, see if we can find a spot for ourselves."
languages.original_text: "Да! Вся моя семья, все... теперь будем осматриваться тут, искать, куда себя пристроить".

traits.locale_text: "That's right! My whole family's here. I guess we'll... have a look around, see if we can find a place for ourselves."

"That's right! My whole family's here. I guess we'll... have a look around, see if we can find a spot for ourselves."

languages.text: 「そうとも！家族全員ここにいる。これから…辺りを見て回って、居場所があるか探してみるつもりだ」
languages.original_text: "That's right! My whole family's here. I guess we'll... have a look around, see if we can find a spot for ourselves."

traits.locale_text: 「そうとも！家族全員ここにいる。これから…辺りを見て回って、居場所があるか探してみるつもりだ」

languages.text: « Oui ! Toute ma famille est là. J'imagine qu'on va... se balader un peu, pour essayer de trouver un coin où s'installer. »
languages.original_text: "That's right! My whole family's here. I guess we'll... have a look around, see if we can find a spot for ourselves."

traits.locale_text: « Oui ! Toute ma famille est là. J'imagine qu'on va... se balader un peu, pour essayer de trouver un coin où s'installer. »

languages.text: “没错！我全家人都和我在一起。我猜我们得……到处看看，想办法找个容身之地。”
languages.original_text: "That's right! My whole family's here. I guess we'll... have a look around, see if we can find a spot for ourselves."

traits.locale_text: “没错！我全家人都和我在一起。我猜我们得……到处看看，想办法找个容身之地。”

languages.text: "Ganz genau! Meine gesamte Familie ist hier. Und jetzt ... müssen wir uns wohl nach einem Ort umsehen, wo wir bleiben können."
languages.original_text: "That's right! My whole family's here. I guess we'll... have a look around, see if we can find a spot for ourselves."

traits.locale_text: "Ganz genau! Meine gesamte Familie ist hier. Und jetzt ... müssen wir uns wohl nach einem Ort umsehen, wo wir bleiben können."

languages.text: «¡Sí! Toda mi familia está aquí. Supongo que tendremos que buscar por la zona... A ver si encontramos algún sitio en el que quedarnos».
languages.original_text: "That's right! My whole family's here. I guess we'll... have a look around, see if we can find a spot for ourselves."

traits.locale_text: «¡Sí! Toda mi familia está aquí. Supongo que tendremos que buscar por la zona... A ver si encontramos algún sitio en el que quedarnos».

languages.text: "Evet! Bütün ailem burada. Galiba... Sağa sola bakınıp kendimize göre bir yer bulmaya çalışacağız."
languages.original_text: "That's right! My whole family's here. I guess we'll... have a look around, see if we can find a spot for ourselves."

traits.locale_text: "Evet! Bütün ailem burada. Sanıyorum... Etrafa biraz bakınıp kendimize göre bir yer bulabilir miyiz görmemiz gerekecek."
